text: Allāhvuṭaṉum avaṉ tutaruṭaṉum pōr purintu, pūmiyil kuḻappam ceytu koṇṭu tiripavarkaḷukkut taṇṭaṇai itutāṉ; (avarkaḷ) kollappaṭutal, allatu tūkkiliṭappaṭutal, allatu māṟukāl māṟu kai vāṅkappaṭutal, allatu nāṭu kaṭattappaṭutal; itu avarkaḷukku ivvulakil ēṟpaṭum iḻivākum;. Maṟumaiyil avarkaḷukku mikakkaṭumaiyāṉa vētaṉaiyumuṇṭu
